attributes.action: Explain to the British Public where the billions of pounds that have gone that were supposed to go to the NHS have actually gone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now the NHS is clearly bankrupt due to badly thought out PFI deals, government incompetence and dreadful mismanagement. We need hold our elected leaders to account and for them to explain to us where the money went and how they plan to put it right.
